about_the_game:
Cybersim: Noetic City is a half cozy, casual room builder where players can create their own cyberpunk themed space. As an agent of the SCS, resolve local cybercrimes in the area and earn credits for your work. From a gaming retreat to a hacker’s haven, you have the option to make your personal space your own and also take down criminals in the city.

Purchase your decor and have it delivered to you.

Visit the online market and purchase all your decor and equipment to create the perfect cyberpunk space and increase your hacking proficiency to fight against cyberwarfare.

Interactable options found everywhere

Play with your gear, interactable options can be found across many items purchased from the market and the apartment itself.

Let there be light

Have complete control of your lighting color and intensity to help create the perfect mood. Control anything from individually placed lights to room ceiling lights.

Creative Mode (Cozy Mode)
If you don't want to dive into the hacking, no problem. We have a creative mode to satisfy all your room decorating needs with no stress at all. Just select what you want and have it shipped to your apartment.


Please keep in mind that this is a small game. We are two devs with a love for cyberpunk and we want share a small slice of that love with everyone.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 580 or GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 6800 XT or GeForce GTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: A half cozy, casual room builder where players can create their own cyberpunk theme space. Play as a secret agent and fight local cybercrimes in the city. Earn credits, decorate your space and upgrade your equipment to take down criminals in the city.
